item.title: Niccolo New Isidro 3 V2 1.53 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | February 5, 2025

Niccolo New Isidro 3 V2 1.53 ETS2

The Niccoló New Isidro 3 is an Argentine industry coach bus, manufactured by Niccoló.
It is the first mod we released with ARBus Mods. It was made from scratch, and its development was made possible thanks to the funding from the community, to whom we are immensely grateful for their support.
This mod is free, and its sale or monetized reupload is prohibited.
The mod is still under development, so expect improvements and stay tuned for news.

Features:
– MB O500RSD chassis with optional third directional axis.- Variables with/without sensor.
– Variables with/without sensor.
– 42 Argentine skins in 8K contributed by the community.
– Animated doors and luggage compartment.
– Multiple customization options.
– Own sound.
– Realistic interior.
– Realistic engine and gearbox specifications.
– Compatibility and optimization for multiplayer.
– Over 30 destination signs (we recommend using the free Argentine map “Mapa Ceibo”).

Credits: 3D Modeling: Tamaki Texturing and conversion: Anti Sounds: Bimo Skins contributed by: dany20rp, Mauro Navarrete, Sebastián Quinteros, bussimulacionarg, Mariano Saucedo, bascraft and Fer Illanes 3D Assistant: Adrian Sign material: ModShop

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD

item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | February 5, 2025

Mercedes Benz Actros 1843 Mp1 1.53 ETS2

– Standalone truck
– Cabin
– Chassis
– Interior
– Has its sound
– Cable simulation
– Tuning Parts
– Cabin accessory support
Fixed crash when buying in dealer
Corrected manifest
Added a mod icon

item.title: MAZ 5340/5440/6430 A8 1.53 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | February 5, 2025

MAZ 5340/5440/6430 A8 1.53 ETS2

Autonomous truck;
The tractor is bought in MAN showrooms;
3 types of chassis: 5440A8 (4×2); 6430A8 (6×4); 5340А8 (tent 4×2);
1 faithfully recreated interior;
Your own wheels and sounds;
Coloring in factory colors, including metallic. It is possible to paint
the plastic parts of the plumage in the color of the cab;
SiSL’s Mega Pack is required for a complete interior tuning;
Extensive external and internal tuning (optics, curtains, GPS, flashing beacons, etc.);
Tested on version: 1.43.x.
In version dated 08/29/22:
Adaptation for version 1.45;
Bugs fixed
The authors of the MAZ-5440 model:
Update assembly: il_86 Re-adaptation to version 1.27 (and to 1.39,
1.40 again) Ols, Drzivago, Shpunt, Volk86, Nik_1MTK, Ra1ley, MiRoN,
Fanis, By_maz_man, MRD_BMZ Update, refinement, adaptation to game
versions 1.16-1.22: Maxim Kokorin, sanek750, Nikita Razgulyaev, vovangt4
Re-registration and adaptation to version 1.25, model optimization,
some bug fixes, some details: il_86
Sounds: Dark_Wolf
Special thanks to: knox_xss
Other used models:
CB Radio: WombaT, Unknown
Fresheners: GTrucker, unknown author
Mobile phone: daf1
Radio Pioneer DEH-P5900, DVR: unknown author
Presumably Moders Team Poland
Improvement and adaptation to 1.38: Maxim Kokorin, sanek750, Nikita Razgulyaev, vovangt4, Phantom94
Adaptation for version 1.43: STORM.45
Adaptation for version 1.45: AJIEHA

Credits: FABIO

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD
